body:
#### Version
python : 3.6.8
cython : 0.29.6
#### code
%load_ext Cython
%%cython -a
import random  
def average_cy1(int n):  
    cdef int i  
    cdef float s = 0  
    for i in range(n):
        s += random.random()
    return s / n
#### error information
DistutilsPlatformError                    Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-3-ddcd257563cc> in <module>
----> 1 get_ipython().run_cell_magic('cython', '-a', 'import random  \ndef average_cy1(int n):  \n    cdef int i  \n    cdef float s = 0  \n    for i in range(n):\n        s += random.random()\n    return s / n\n')

   2345                 magic_arg_s = self.var_expand(line, stack_depth)
   2346             with self.builtin_trap:
-> 2347                 result = fn(magic_arg_s, cell)
   2348             return result
   2349

--> 187         call = lambda f, *a, **k: f(*a, **k)
    188 
    189         if callable(arg):

--> 333                               quiet=args.quiet)

    447         else:
--> 448             self._build_extensions_serial()
    449 
    450     def _build_extensions_parallel(self):

d:\python\Lib\distutils\command\build_ext.py in _build_extensions_serial(self)

    472             with self._filter_build_errors(ext):
--> 473                 self.build_extension(ext)
    474 
    475     @contextlib.contextmanager

DistutilsPlatformError: Unable to find vcvarsall.bat

I do not know how to solve this issue, i need your help.

comment_data.body:
Note there is a bug with Python 3.7 right now related to this that the wiki doesn't help with:

https://bugs.python.org/issue35699

title: DistutilsPlatformError: Unable to find vcvarsall.bat
